alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Clark; Fairfield; Franklin; Madison; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 06 at 2:04AM EDT until July 06 at 5:00AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Northwestern Fairfield County in central Ohio... Franklin County in central Ohio... Northern Madison County in central Ohio... Southern Union County in central Ohio... Southeastern Champaign County in west central Ohio... Northern Clark County in west central Ohio... * Until 500 AM EDT. * At 204 AM EDT, Radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain in From Urbana...eastward to Springfield and through Columbus and Baltimore. Between 1.5 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1.5 to 2 inches are possible. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that may experience flash flooding include... Columbus, Springfield, Dublin, Westerville, Reynoldsburg, Grove City, Upper Arlington, Gahanna, Hilliard, Pickerington, Worthington, Bexley, Urbana, London, New Carlisle, Jefferson, Northridge, Canal Winchester, Groveport and Plain City. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE EXPECTED RAINFALL RATE...1.5-2 INCHES IN 2 HOURS
info.instruction: Move to higher ground now. Act quickly to protect your life. To report flash flooding, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Champaign; Clark; Fairfield; Franklin; Madison; Union
